subtitle: A very easy dessert for one.

method.text: Whisk the egg yolks, water and caster sugar together until pale and creamy. Add the peanuts. In a separate non-greasy bowl, whisk the egg whites until just stiff.
Carefully fold the beaten egg white into the egg yolk mixture. Heat a 15 - 18 cm omelette pan over a very gentle heat.
Spread the egg mixture into the pan. Cook gently, without moving, until the bottom is set and pale golden brown.
Place the omelette pan under a preheated grill until pale golden brown. Dredge with icing sugar and serve with the ice cream.

title: Nutty souffle with ice cream
